title: Brazil Pedagogy Program Manager
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that encourages the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. We are seeking a hardworking and results-focused Pedagogy Program Manager to join the Apple Developer Academy team in Brazil!
description: Assist the Apple Pedagogy Team in managing the relationships amongst all parties for all Apple Academy, Foundations and Residency projects in Brazil. Monitor and report classroom and administrative initiatives of Apple Programs in the country...
preferred_qualifications: Proficiency in one or several of Apple App Development topics listed here is preferred: Coding, Swift language, Xcode IDE, UIKit and SwiftUI, Design, Human Interface Guidelines, Integrating Design and Coding, App Store Business, Monetization options, Metrics.
